kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot
kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Does Page Contain
kw.doc: Does page contain expected text

kw.name: Exit For Loop If
kw.doc: Stops executing the enclosing for loop if the ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Create a ZIP file of the receipts
Archive Folder With Zip
kw.doc: Create a zip archive of a folder

suite.doc: Orders robots from RobotSpareBin Industries Inc. Saves the order HTML receipt as a PDF file. Saves the screenshot of the ordered robot. Embeds the screenshot of the robot to the PDF receipt. Creates ZIP archive of the receipts and the images.
